ComicInfo.Summary:
On the horizon, Noah's Ark can be seen. The passengers on board the vessel have no idea that they are sailing into a death trap. Even if Shrae and his monsters can stop the creatures that are hunting them, they will need to come to an agreement regarding how monsters and mankind will live together in this new world.
From writer Cullen Bunn (UNHOLY GRAIL, X-Men Blue, Deadpool, Venom) and artist Juan Doe (ANIMOSITY: THE RISE, AMERICAN MONSTER, WORLD READER) comes a sinister tale of biblical proportions!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-23 11:17:18. [CVDB703083]

ComicInfo.Title: An Ending
